constantValues: Commitment representing a time interval with start/end times and duration.

members.name: isAllDayEvent

constantValues: Select whether the appointment is an all-day event to make sure that the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

members.description: Select whether the appointment is an all-day event to make sure that the required resources are scheduled for the full day.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the purpose of the appointment.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the purpose of the appointment.

members.name: globalObjectId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the appointment in Microsoft Office Outlook. The ID is used to synchronize the appointment between Microsoft Dynamics 365 and the correct Exchange account.

members.description: Shows the ID of the appointment in Microsoft Office Outlook. The ID is used to synchronize the appointment between Microsoft Dynamics 365 and the correct Exchange account.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Appointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: outlookOwnerApptId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the Microsoft Office Outlook appointment owner that correlates to the PR_OWNER_APPT_ID MAPI property.

members.description: Unique identifier of the Microsoft Office Outlook appointment owner that correlates to the PR_OWNER_APPT_ID MAPI property.

members.name: location

constantValues: Type the location where the appointment will take place, such as a conference room or customer office.

members.description: Type the location where the appointment will take place, such as a conference room or customer office.

members.name: stateCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Shows whether the appointment is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled appointments are read-only and can't be edited.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Appointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the ID of the recurring series of an instance.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the ID of the recurring series of an instance.

members.name: originalStartDate

constantValues: The original start date of the appointment.

members.description: The original start date of the appointment.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the process.

members.description: Shows the ID of the process.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the stage.

members.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

members.name: attachmentErrors

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}
constantValues: The appointment was saved as a Microsoft Dynamics 365 appointment record, but not all the attachments could be saved with it. An attachment cannot be saved if it is blocked or if its file type is invalid.
Select the error code to identify issues with the outlook item recipients or attachments, such as blocked attachments.

members.description: Select the error code to identify issues with the outlook item recipients or attachments, such as blocked attachments.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'attachmentErrors_display' is added to the 'Appointment' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'attachmentErrors'
addSupportingAttribute.name: attachmentErrors_display

members.name: attachmentCount

constantValues: Shows the number of attachments on the appointment.

members.description: Shows the number of attachments on the appointment.

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the appointment record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the appointment record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this appointment. This field is for internal use only.

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.
